basics.name: Subin Erattakulangara
basics.label: Machine learning Researcher
basics.summary: Passionate Engineer with 5+ years of experience in deep learning, specializing in computer vision and NLP. Proven expertise in designing efficient AI algorithms and open-source software development. Seeking to leverage my skills for innovative solutions.

work.name: Kitware Inc.
work.summary: Designed an AI adapter for the Digital Slide Archive, enabling developers to construct and integrate AI applications with the open-source HistomicsTK toolkit.
highlights: Developed AI tutorials for the DSA AI adapter.
Managed debugging and maintenance of the HistomicsTK library & Digital Slide Archive (DSA).

work.name: University of Iowa
work.summary: Developed AI/ML tools for upper airway segmentation in 2D, 3D, and 3D + time MRI data, enhancing analysis capabilities.
highlights: Built segmentation models for assessing upper airway dynamics for sleep apnea.
Developed transfer learning methods for small dataset network training.

work.name: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
work.summary: Developed and implemented intelligent chatbot systems and contributed to robotics projects.
highlights: Led design and 3D printing of humanoid robot shell.
Developed ATM testing robotic hand and voice chatbot.

awards.title: Innovation Challenge 2023 Business Model Competition Finalist
Best Poster Award
awards.awarder: University of Iowa College of Engineering Research Open House
